Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near Stony Island/76th
ShortDescription: Southbound 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 76th, Jeffery, 79th and Stony Island due to street blockage near Stony Island/76th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 76th, Jeffery, 79th and Stony Island due to street blockage near Stony Island/76th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with delays near Ashland/63rd due to  signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with delays near Ashland/63rd due to signal problems.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
